description: Primes of the form (n+1)^n + n^(n-1), n >= 1.
comments: Sum of reciprocals (omitting the 3) = 0.1046077441562072936197025883... Next term for n=219 is too large for the database.Generated by n= 1, 2, 3, 8, 9, 15, 16, 219, ...
author: _Cino Hilliard_, Aug 30 2003
extensions: Leading  prime 3 added by Michel Lagneau, Nov 17 2010
